social.title: SOCIAL & LIVE LEARNING
social.text: The most efficient way to learn: Join a cohort with classmates like yourself, live streamings, coding jam sessions, live mentorships with real experts and keep the motivation.

iconogram.title: Start coding using Javascript
iconogram.text: Get started in coding with the world's most popular language. Build your first projects with an Excuse Generator, Domain name finder, and more than 300 exercises.

iconogram.title: Full Stack Coding Bootcamp
iconogram.text: Become a Full Stack software developer using Python, React and Javascript. The most in-demand skills. Find a job as a developer.

iconogram.title: Deep Dive into Python
iconogram.text: Get started in coding with the world's most popular language. Build your first projects and practice with more than 300 exercises.

iconogram.title: Data Science and ML
iconogram.text: Learn Python to collect and manage data. Create models and solve problems using Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI.
